rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open entrance hall that incorporates a modern design with minimalist aesthetics. It serves as a transitional space from the outside to the interior.
rooms.vastu_notes: Positioned to face the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with clean lines and open space, designed for relaxation. It includes seating areas with a focus on natural lighting.
rooms.vastu_notes: Aligned to the north to maximize positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A minimalist dining area integrated with the living room, featuring modular seating arrangements.
rooms.vastu_notes: Considered in conjunction with adjacent spaces to ensure harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: A compact area dedicated to the servants, providing basic facilities including a small kitchenette and a modest living space.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed in an auxiliary area on the eastern side of the plot for minimal disturbance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A minimalist guest bedroom with built-in storage and en-suite bathroom facilities.
rooms.vastu_notes: Optimized placement to the west for relaxation and positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom with ample natural light and a private balcony facing the courtyard. It includes built-in closets and en-suite bathroom.
rooms.vastu_notes: Positioned towards the north-east for tranquility and prosperity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom with minimalist fixtures, designed to serve both guest and master bedrooms.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed on the south side of the living area to balance energy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A secure, elegant entrance with glass panels for natural light and a vestibule to create a sense of arrival.
openings.vastu_notes: Facing the east enhances auspicious energy.

openings.name: Secondary Entrance/Exit
openings.description: A discreet exit used primarily for service purposes, integrating with the servant's quarters.
openings.vastu_notes: Positioned to ensure proper flow of energy without disturbing the main living area.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: An additional entrance dedicated to the servants and service staff, ensuring privacy and efficient access.
openings.vastu_notes: Placed on the eastern side for convenience and positive energy alignment.

balcony.description: A modern minimalist balcony attached to the master bedroom for an unobstructed view of the surrounding landscape.
balcony.vastu_notes: Aligned in a manner that allows maximum sunlight and air flow.

open_courtyard.description: A central open space for relaxation, dining, or small gatherings. The courtyard integrates natural elements such as plants and water features.
open_courtyard.vastu_notes: Centrally located to serve as a grounding energy center.

storage_spaces.closets: Integrated into bedrooms and living areas

levels.floor_plan_notes: The design leverages minimalist principles with clean lines, open spaces, and functional zones. Vastu considerations have been integrated by aligning key rooms with cardinal directions that promote harmony and positive energy. The plot dimensions (80x100 feet) are optimally utilized to create a balanced layout while allowing for sufficient circulation and privacy.
